channel.title: Jeonju on Nii's Travel Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Jeonju on Nii's Travel Blog

item.title: Jeonju
item.description: Jeonju! The City of Gastronomy! I’m guessing that means they have tasty food there. Lets see shall we… This blog post covers two days in Jeonju, it was an overnight stay at a traditional style room, complete with rock hard thin mattresses, sleeping on the floor, and heatpiped flooring (amazing!) So old yet so new (the place just recently finished with renovations actually) This is an image of outside the room.
